TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to update the IsActiveIndicator of an AirspaceControlMeans ControlFeature Sub-Type in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an AirspaceControlMeans with no IsActiveIndicator. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the AirspaceControlMeans to IsActiveIndicator = Yes. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly. Nation A updates the AirspaceControlMeans to IsActiveIndicator = No. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes AirspaceControlMeans message elements, for instance Ground Picture > Air Defence. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updated AirspaceControlMeans is interpreted and displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an AirControlPoint (ACP) with no IsActiveIndicator.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ACP correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the ACP with IsActiveIndicator = Yes.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ACP correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the ACP with IsActiveIndicator = No.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the ACP correctly.
